description:
Hozuki becomes embroiled in a low speed chase between flying policemen and air taxis with giant heads. Later, he teaches some of his more slacking employees the art of torture.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Binan ni mo Iroiro Aru / Kachikajigoku
Pretty Boys Need Love Too / The Crackling Hell
Un gentleman séduisant / Angoisse aux Enfers
美男にもいろいろある / かちかぢごく
